topic.title: Supported Container Platforms
topic.shortdesc: Couchbase Server supports a variety of container technologies and platforms. Use this topic to ensure that your container environment is supported.

section.title: Couchbase Server Official Container Image Compatibility
section.p:

section.title: Couchbase Autonomous Operator Compatibility
section.p: The Couchbase Autonomous Operator is compatible with the official containers found on Docker Hub and OpenShift Hub.
